name: Click Murder - Stickman Army Edition
description:
The Stick people have finally come to realize that they are always in danger, so they are going to try to evade the mysterious curse that's caused their brothers to catch on fire, get crushed under anvils, and exploded and imploded. They should know there's no where they can run to avoid their death! Show them who is in charge and kill the sticks!

Use your finger to point and click in the correct sequence to kill all the stickmen in space and the military station.

There is only one rule. Do not let a stickman see another stickman die!
